snippet: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. gave a speech describing the Obama administration's view that it is lawful to kill American citizens accused of joining Al Qaeda, at least under certain circumstances.
abstract: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. gave a speech describing the Obama administration's view that it is lawful to kill American citizens accused of joining Al Qaeda, at least under certain circumstances.

headline.main: Holder Outlines Policy on Killing Terrorism Suspects
